products.name: Chocolate
products.description: Rich, creamy and indulgent, our chocolate ice cream is a classic
products.ingredients: Milkfat, Nonfat Milk, Sugar, Corn Syrup, Whey, Cocoa (Processed with Alkali), Sugar, Salt, Carrageenan, Natural Vanilla.

products.name: Strawberry
products.description: Strawberry ice cream with real strawberries
products.ingredients: Milkfat, Nonfat Milk, Sugar, Strawberries, Corn Syrup, Whey,  Stabilizer (Mono and Di Glycerides, Locust Bean Gum, Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Natural and Artificial Flavors

products.name: Vanilla
products.description: A rich blend of sweet cream and real vanilla give a sophisticated taste to this classic
products.ingredients: Milkfat, Nonfat Milk, Sugar, Corn Syrup, Whey, Stabilizer (Mono and Diglycerides, Locust Bean Gum Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Natural and Artificial Vanilla Flavors

products.name: Cookie N Cream
products.description: A classic blend of vanilla-based ice cream and Oreo cookie chunks
products.ingredients: A classic blend of vanilla-based ice cream and Oreo cookie chunks

products.name: Mint Chocolate Chip
products.description: Refreshing mint ice cream with pieces of chocolate chips
products.ingredients: Milkfat, Nonfat Milk, Sugar, Corn Syrup, Whey, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Powder (Processed with Alkali), Partially Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Cocoa Powder, Salt, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavor, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum,

products.name: Cookie Dough
products.description: Vanilla-based ice cream with real cookie dough pieces & chocolate chips
products.ingredients: Milkfat, Nonfat Milk, Sugar, Corn Syrup, Whey, Wheat Flour, Butter, Liquid Pasteurized Eggs, Vegetable Shortening

products.name: Raspberry Cheesecake
products.description: Speculaas cookie base ice cream with crushed cookies and semi-sweet chocolate chips
products.ingredients: Made with real cake pieces and candy sprinkles, you don't have to wait until your birthday to enjoy this.
